name: Dosage.asNeededFor
title: Dosage.asNeededFor
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Indicates whether the Medication is only taken based on a precondition for taking the Medication (CodeableConcept).
element.comment: Can express "as needed" with a reason by including the CodeableConcept.  In this case the Boolean is assumed to be False, then the dose is given according to the schedule and is not "prn" or "as needed".

extension.valueString: A coded concept identifying the precondition that should be met or evaluated prior to consuming or administering a medication dose.  For example "pain", "30 minutes prior to sexual intercourse", "on flare-up" etc.

mapping.map: .outboundRelationship[typeCode=PRCN].target[classCode=OBS, moodCode=EVN, code="as needed"].value=boolean or codable concept
